response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you given its worth of $800,000 to you. My initial offer to you is to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to my personal valuation, while still ensuring a substantial return on my investment.

Please consider this offer carefully, as I am confident that the product will provide you with immense benefits and opportunities. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
